description: Binary file format that delivers vector graphics (especially animations) and other data types, including bitmapped video, over the Internet to the Macromedia Flash Player.
name: Macromedia Flash SWF File Format, Version 8
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">swf</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
